capsules_submitted.utterance: Snape's affiliation with Hogwarts is a well-documented fact. I mean, he was the Potions master for many years and held a certain... respect within the school's hierarchy. Although, his behavior towards students, especially Harry Potter, was often quite... intimidating.
capsules_submitted.reply: i would like to know. what is the title of professor snape?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Snape is indeed the title of the potion teacher at Hogwarts. I've had my fair share of dealings with him, and let me tell you, he's a complex individual to say the least. His expertise in potions is unmatched, but his demeanor can be quite intimidating at times. Still, I have to admit that I've learned a great deal from him, even if it was often begrudgingly.
capsules_submitted.reply: i would like to know. who is the character that casts a spell to teach potions?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So Harry's hair is actually black. I'm quite sure about that. It seems pretty clear to me.
capsules_submitted.reply: i did not know that! i've never heard of anyone with black hair before, valeria, tell me more about it!

capsules_submitted.utterance: So Harry's hair is looking really dark today. I can see that he's rocking the whole black look.

You know, I was just talking to Harry the other day and he does look like he's got some pretty dark hair going on. He's always been a bit of a stylish guy, but I have to say, that black hair really suits him.
capsules_submitted.reply: i am curious. what kind of activities does valeria enjoy doing with her dark hair?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I'm an administrator on this platform, and one of the roles that comes with that is to moderate and enforce the rules. That's why I've been tasked with dealing with users who don't follow the guidelines, like Filch in the Harry Potter series.

capsules_submitted.utterance: So Hermione's lineage is a bit complicated. She has both Muggle and wizarding heritage, which makes her a mixed-wizard. I'm pretty sure that's the case, so I'd say it's confirmed.
capsules_submitted.reply: i am curious. what kind of talents does valeria have as a mixed wizard?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Vernon does look a bit on the heavier side, doesn't he? I mean, I've seen him around and he's definitely not as slender as some of our other colleagues.
